sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sync new status report fields from project</description>
        <name>Update Status Report Fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function syncStatusReportFields() {
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('project_status');
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		new ProjectStatusReport(gr).syncValuesFromProject();
		gr.update();
	}
	
})();
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-08-30 13:54:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d7816853933c0300ea933007f67ffb22</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Status Report Fields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d7816853933c0300ea933007f67ffb22</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-08-31 07:06:07</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
